solution_line_template: Victoria has {oli_scoops} x {victoria_multiplier} = <<{oli_scoops}*{victoria_multiplier}={victoria_scoops}>>{victoria_scoops} scoops of ice cream.
Therefore, Victoria has {victoria_scoops} - {oli_scoops} = <<{victoria_scoops}-{oli_scoops}={victoria_more_than_oli}>>{victoria_more_than_oli} more scoops of ice cream than Oli.
